Very Low.title: Finding Your Spark
Very Low.description: Your happiness score is currently very low. This is a tough place to be, but small steps can spark change.

tips.title: Compassion
tips.description: Be gentle with yourself. You are doing the best you can.

tips.title: Small Joys

Low.title: Building Joy
Low.description: Happiness feels a bit out of reach right now. Let's focus on building a foundation for joy.

tips.title: Gratitude Journal
tips.description: Write down 3 things you are grateful for, no matter how small.

tips.title: Music
tips.description: Listen to a playlist of songs that used to make you smile.

tips.title: Nature Walk
tips.description: Spending time in nature is scientifically proven to lift mood.

Moderate.title: Balanced Contentment
Moderate.description: You have a moderate level of happiness. You can build on this stable foundation.

tips.title: Socialize
tips.description: Make plans with a friend you haven't seen in a while.

tips.title: Acts of Kindness
tips.description: Doing something nice for others often boosts our own happiness.

High.title: High Happiness
High.description: You're feeling good! This is a great time to spread that positivity and strengthen resilience.

tips.title: Savoring
tips.description: Take time to really enjoy moments of joy, making them last longer.

tips.title: Flow State
tips.description: Engage in activities where you lose track of time.

tips.title: Future Goals
tips.description: Use this positive energy to plan for future aspirations.

Very High.title: Thriving!
Very High.description: You are thriving! Your high levels of happiness are a wonderful asset.

tips.title: Mentoring

tips.title: Deepen Connections

tips.title: Mindful Appreciation
